title: Developing Blended Teaching Methods for Designing a Disaster Management Literacy (DML) Hub

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capacity to develop disaster management literacy education content integrated with mathematics curriculum for preservice/in-service teachers

learning_goals: They design instructional materials that apply the three elements of disaster management literacy (knowledge/skills/attitudes) to mathematics curricular contexts.
They perform project-based learning (PBL) tasks based on disaster scenarios while interacting with audiovisual materials on a blended learning platform.
They propose a method to implement a data-sharing system between learners and disaster responders using mathematical data visualization tools.

resources: Data Analysis Tools for Mathematics Education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
